"Nimrod": "I'm in charge of guard duty here, name's Nimrod."
"You never know when or where the DOLLS might attack. Means we need to keep a sharp eye out at all times."
"Hey, perfect timing. I've got something for you to do."
"Need you to take care of some tangos in North Retem."
"Someone like you should have no problem. Hope I can count on you."
"I see, guess it's not in the cards... Maybe when you're not busy, then."
"I knew you were the right pick. Nice job!"
